text: (upbeat music)
- Matt Rothman.
I'm a recruiting manager here
for the Amazon partner organization
and Marketplace organizations.
I've been with AWS a year and a half.

My biggest surprise since
I've joined is, I think,

the opportunity to really come
in and build from scratch.
Coming from my previous organization,

there were a lot of
processes that were in place.
We had a playbook that we ran and I think,

coming to AWS, we certainly
have a lot of processes

but there's so much room
to invent and simplify.
Every day is day one,

meaning that you're gonna
get a different problem

that comes on your desk
every day you walk into work,

and we need people that
can really think big,

that have that mentality
to be able to look
at how they're gonna find a solution.
And we're looking for people
that are really customer obsessed.

We're looking for people
that really have that ability

to work backwards from what
their customer needs are,

both from a data
perspective, but also just

from an understanding
their business perspective,
to be able to execute for them.
So what I'd say is, if you ever wanted
to have done high volume executive search,
that's what our team does.

As we look at kind of
continuing to build here,

I think an incredible value
prop is you are working
with some of the industry leaders.

Our customers and our clients
and our internal customers
and the people that are part

of this partner organization
are the best at their craft.
